query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 La gloria di colui che tutto move 2 per l’universo penetra, e risplende 3 in una parte più e meno altrove.
query.error: **English:** 1 The glory of Him who moves everything 2 penetrates the universe, and shines 3 more in one part and less in another.
query.result: 1 Kemuliaan Dia yang menggerakkan segalanya 2 menembus alam semesta, dan bersinar 3 lebih banyak di satu bagian dan lebih sedikit di bagian lain.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 Nel ciel che più de la sua luce prende 5 fu’ io, e vidi cose che ridire 6 né sa né può chi di là sù discende;
query.error: **English:** 4 In the heaven that receives most of its light, 5 I was, and I saw things that to retell 6 no one who descends from up there knows how or is able;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 perché appressando sé al suo disire, 8 nostro intelletto si profonda tanto, 9 che dietro la memoria non può ire.
query.error: **English:** 7 because in approaching its desire, 8 our intellect sinks so deeply 9 that memory cannot follow it.
query.result: 7 karena dalam mendekati keinginannya, 8 intelek kita tenggelam begitu dalam, 9 sehingga ingatan tidak dapat mengikutinya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Veramente quant’ io del regno santo 11 ne la mia mente potei far tesoro, 12 sarà ora materia del mio canto.
query.error: **English:** 10 Truly, as much as I was able to treasure in my mind 11 of the holy realm, 12 will now be the subject of my song.
query.result: 10 Sungguh, sebanyak yang dapat kusimpan dalam pikiranku 11 tentang alam suci, 12 akan menjadi bahan nyanyianku sekarang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
13 O buono Appollo, a l’ultimo lavoro 14 fammi del tuo valor sì fatto vaso, 15 come dimandi a dar l’amato alloro.
query.error: **English:** 13 O good Apollo, for the final labor 14 make me a vessel of your worth, 15 as I asked when I desired the beloved laurel.
query.result: 13 Wahai Apollo yang baik, untuk pekerjaan terakhir 14 jadikanlah aku bejana yang berharga, 15 sebagaimana yang kuminta ketika menginginkan pohon laurel yang dicintai.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
16 Infino a qui l’un giogo di Parnaso 17 assai mi fu; ma or con amendue 18 m’è uopo intrar ne l’aringo rimaso.
query.error: **English:** 16 Up to this point, one peak of Parnassus 17 was enough for me; but now with both 18 I must enter the remaining arena.
query.result: 16 Hingga saat ini, satu puncak Parnassus 17 sudah cukup bagiku; tetapi sekarang dengan keduanya 18 aku harus memasuki gelanggang yang tersisa.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 Entra nel petto mio, e spira tue 20 sì come quando Marsïa traesti 21 de la vagina de le membra sue.
query.error: **English:** 19 Enter my breast, and breathe into it 20 just as when you pulled Marsyas 21 from the sheath of his limbs.
query.result: 19 Masuklah ke dalam dadaku, dan hembuskanlah 20 seperti ketika kau menarik Marsyas 21 dari sarung anggota tubuhnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.error: **English:** 22 O divine virtue, if you grant me 23 so much that the shadow of the blessed kingdom 24 imprinted in my mind I manifest,
query.result: 22 Wahai kebajikan ilahi, jika Engkau memberiku 23 begitu banyak sehingga bayangan kerajaan yang diberkati 24 terpatri dalam pikiranku aku nyatakan,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 vedra’mi al piè del tuo diletto legno 26 venire, e coronarmi de le foglie 27 che la materia e tu mi farai degno.
query.error: **English:** 25 you will see me at the foot of your beloved tree 26 come, and crown myself with the leaves 27 that matter and you will make me worthy.
query.result: 25 Engkau akan melihatku di kaki pohon kesayangan-Mu 26 datang, dan memahkotai diriku dengan dedaunan 27 yang materi dan Engkau akan membuatku layak.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.

query.result: 28 Begitu jarang, bapa, ia dipetik 29 untuk kemenangan, baik oleh Kaisar atau penyair, 30 kesalahan dan aib keinginan manusia,

query.prompt:

query.prompt:

query.result: 34 Percikan kecil dapat menyalakan api besar: 35 mungkin di belakangku, dengan suara yang lebih baik, 36 doa akan dipanjatkan agar Cirra menjawab.

query.prompt:

query.prompt:
